text: Peter Fleischmann (26 July 1937 – 11 August 2021) was a German movie director and screenwriter. He was born in Zweibrücken, then-Nazi Germany. His career lasted from 1957 to 2006. He was known for directing Hunting Scenes from Bavaria, Weak Spot and Hard To Be a God. Fleischmann died on 11 August 2021 Potsdam, Germany from problems caused by a fall at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German movie directors Category:German screenwriters Category:German movie producers Category:Accidental deaths from falls
title: Peter Fleischmann
